description.zh-cn: 中国近代政治人物，中国共产党和中国工农红军高级将领，赣东北革命根据地和红十军的创建者。
description.en: A modern Chinese political figure, a senior leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, and the founder of the Northeastern Jiangxi Revolutionary Base Area and the Red Tenth Army.

description.zh-cn: 方志敏的出生地。
description.en: The birthplace of Fang Zhimin.

nodes.id: 江西省立甲种工业学校

zh-cn: 江西省立甲种工业学校

description.zh-cn: 方志敏曾就读的学校。
description.en: A school that Fang Zhimin attended.

description.zh-cn: 方志敏曾就读的教会学校。
description.en: A missionary school that Fang Zhimin attended.

description.zh-cn: 中国的执政党，方志敏于1924年加入。
description.en: The ruling political party of China, which Fang Zhimin joined in 1924.

description.zh-cn: 国民政府江西省政府主席，曾将方志敏“礼送”出境。
description.en: Chairman of the Jiangxi Provincial Government of the Nationalist Government, who once exiled Fang Zhimin.

description.zh-cn: 由方志敏、黄道、邵式平等人领导的农民暴动。
description.en: A peasant uprising led by Fang Zhimin, Huang Dao, Shao Shiping, and others.

description.zh-cn: 与方志敏共同领导弋横暴动的中共党员。
description.en: A CCP member who co-led the Yiyang-Hengfeng Uprising with Fang Zhimin.

description.zh-cn: 与方志敏共同领导弋横暴动的中共党员。
description.en: A CCP member who co-led the Yiyang-Hengfeng Uprising with Fang Zhimin.

description.zh-cn: 由方志敏创建的革命根据地。
description.en: A revolutionary base area established by Fang Zhimin.

description.zh-cn: 由方志敏于1930年7月组建的中国工农红军部队。
description.en: A unit of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army formed by Fang Zhimin in July 1930.

description.zh-cn: 中国瓷上肖像画创始人，在红十军攻占景德镇时被杀。
description.en: The founder of Chinese porcelain portrait painting, who was killed when the Red Tenth Army captured Jingdezhen.

description.zh-cn: 其左倾方针曾遭到方志敏的抵制。
description.en: His leftist policies were resisted by Fang Zhimin.

description.zh-cn: 与红十军合编为红十军团的中国工农红军部队。
description.en: A unit of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army that merged with the Red Tenth Army to form the Red Tenth Army Corps.

description.zh-cn: 由红七军团和红十军于1934年11月合编而成，方志敏任军政委员会主席。
description.en: Formed in November 1934 by the merger of the Red Seventh Army Corps and the Red Tenth Army, with Fang Zhimin as the chairman of its military and political committee.

description.zh-cn: 导致红十军团战败，方志敏等人被俘的关键战役。
description.en: A key battle that led to the defeat of the Red Tenth Army Corps and the capture of Fang Zhimin and others.

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军将领，在谭家桥击败红十军团，并俘获方志敏。
description.en: A general of the National Revolutionary Army who defeated the Red Tenth Army Corps at Tanjiqiao and captured Fang Zhimin.

description.zh-cn: 红十军团第十九师师长，在谭家桥战斗中战死。
description.en: Commander of the 19th Division of the Red Tenth Army Corps, who was killed in the Battle of Tanjiqiao.

description.zh-cn: 红十军团军团长，因优柔寡断错失突围良机，后与方志敏一同被俘并被处决。
description.en: Commander of the Red Tenth Army Corps, whose indecisiveness led to missing opportunities to break out. He was later captured and executed along with Fang Zhimin.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国训政时期的中央政府，俘虏并处决了方志敏。
description.en: The central government of the Republic of China during the Tutelage Period, which captured and executed Fang Zhimin.

description.zh-cn: 国民党将领，下令将方志敏秘密处死。
description.en: A Kuomintang general who ordered the secret execution of Fang Zhimin.

description.zh-cn: 红十军团下属师，由寻淮洲担任师长，曾扣留并处决美国传教士师达能夫妇。
description.en: A division under the Red Tenth Army Corps, commanded by Xun Huaizhou, which detained and executed American missionaries John and Betty Stam.

description.zh-cn: 美国传教士，于1934年12月被红十军团第十九师处决。
description.en: An American missionary executed by the 19th Division of the Red Tenth Army Corps in December 1934.

description.zh-cn: 美国传教士，师达能的妻子，于1934年12月被红十军团第十九师处决。
description.en: An American missionary, wife of John Stam, executed by the 19th Division of the Red Tenth Army Corps in December 1934.

description.zh-cn: 方志敏在狱中写下的遗稿之一。
description.en: One of the manuscripts written by Fang Zhimin in prison.

description.zh-cn: 方志敏在狱中写下的遗稿之一。
description.en: One of the manuscripts written by Fang Zhimin in prison.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要领导人，曾称赞方志敏为“人民英雄”。
description.en: The main leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, who praised Fang Zhimin as a 'people's hero'.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾将方志敏比作民族英雄文天祥。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China who compared Fang Zhimin to the national hero Wen Tianxiang.

description.zh-cn: 前中共中央总书记，曾高度评价方志敏的崇高品格和浩然正气。
description.en: Former General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, who highly praised Fang Zhimin's noble character and integrity.

description.zh-cn: 方志敏出生于江西省弋阳县漆工镇湖塘村。
description.en: Fang Zhimin was born in Hutang Village, Qigong Town, Yiyang County, Jiangxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 方志纯是方志敏的堂弟。
description.en: Fang Zhichun was Fang Zhimin's paternal cousin.

relationships.target: 江西省立甲种工业学校

description.zh-cn: 时任国民政府江西省政府主席的朱培德将方志敏“礼送”出境。
description.en: Zhu Peide, then Chairman of the Jiangxi Provincial Government of the Nationalist Government, exiled Fang Zhimin.

description.zh-cn: 方志敏担任弋横暴动的总指挥。
description.en: Fang Zhimin served as the commander-in-chief of the Yiyang-Hengfeng Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 黄道与方志敏等人共同领导了弋横暴动。
description.en: Huang Dao, along with Fang Zhimin and others, co-led the Yiyang-Hengfeng Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 邵式平与方志敏等人共同领导了弋横暴动。
description.en: Shao Shiping, along with Fang Zhimin and others, co-led the Yiyang-Hengfeng Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 红十军攻占景德镇时，瓷上肖像画创始人邓碧珊被杀。
description.en: When the Red Tenth Army captured Jingdezhen, Deng Bishan, the founder of porcelain portrait painting, was killed.

description.zh-cn: 方志敏对曾洪易的左倾方针进行了抵制。
description.en: Fang Zhimin resisted the leftist policies of Zeng Hongyi.

description.zh-cn: 红七军团与红十军合编为红十军团。
description.en: The Red Seventh Army Corps merged with the Red Tenth Army to form the Red Tenth Army Corps.

description.zh-cn: 红七军团与红十军合编为红十军团。
description.en: The Red Seventh Army Corps merged with the Red Tenth Army to form the Red Tenth Army Corps.

position.en: Chairman of the Military and Political Committee

description.zh-cn: 在王耀武部对红十军团的袭击中，红十九师师长寻淮洲战死。
description.en: During the attack on the Red Tenth Army Corps by Wang Yaowu's troops, Xun Huaizhou, commander of the 19th Division, was killed in action.

description.zh-cn: 由于军团长刘畴西的优柔寡断，红十军团一再错失突围良机，最终导致被围。
description.en: Due to the indecisiveness of commander Liu Chouxi, the Red Tenth Army Corps repeatedly missed opportunities to break out, ultimately leading to its encirclement.

description.zh-cn: 在怀玉山之战失败后，方志敏于1935年1月29日被俘。
description.en: After the defeat in the Battle of Huaiyu Mountain, Fang Zhimin was captured on January 29, 1935.

description.zh-cn: 方志敏于1935年1月被国民政府军俘虏，并于同年8月6日被处决。
description.en: Fang Zhimin was captured by the Nationalist Government's army in January 1935 and executed on August 6 of the same year.

description.zh-cn: 红十军团军团长刘畴西被国民政府军俘虏，并与方志敏一同被处决。
description.en: Liu Chouxi, commander of the Red Tenth Army Corps, was captured by the Nationalist Government's army and executed along with Fang Zhimin.

description.zh-cn: 根据电文记录，顾祝同遵令将方志敏秘密处死。
description.en: According to telegraph records, Gu Zhutong followed orders to secretly execute Fang Zhimin.

description.zh-cn: 红十军团第十九师于1934年12月6日扣留并处决了美国传教士师达能。
description.en: The 19th Division of the Red Tenth Army Corps detained and executed American missionary John Stam on December 6, 1934.

description.zh-cn: 红十军团第十九师于1934年12月6日扣留并处决了美国传教士史文明。
description.en: The 19th Division of the Red Tenth Army Corps detained and executed American missionary Betty Stam on December 6, 1934.

description.zh-cn: 方志敏在狱中创作了《可爱的中国》等文稿。
description.en: Fang Zhimin wrote manuscripts such as 'Lovely China' while in prison.

description.zh-cn: 方志敏在狱中创作了《清贫》等文稿。
description.en: Fang Zhimin wrote manuscripts such as 'Poverty' while in prison.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东称赞方志敏是“以身殉志，不亦伟乎”的“人民英雄”。
description.en: Mao Zedong praised Fang Zhimin as a 'people's hero' who was 'great in sacrificing his life for his ideals'.

description.zh-cn: 叶剑英赋诗将方志敏比作文天祥之后的又一位民族英雄。
description.en: Ye Jianying wrote a poem comparing Fang Zhimin to another national hero after Wen Tianxiang.

description.zh-cn: 在纪念方志敏同志诞辰一百周年座谈会上，胡锦涛称赞方志敏的崇高品格和浩然正气是党的宝贵精神财富。
description.en: At a symposium commemorating the 100th anniversary of Comrade Fang Zhimin's birth, Hu Jintao praised Fang Zhimin's noble character and integrity as a precious spiritual asset of the Party.
